plot: Boy, his three pals and an old man who were sailing down a river in England are intercepted by a mugger, who turns their boat into a pirate-ship.
title: The Steam-Driven Adventures of Riverboat Bill
plot_es: Boy, his three pals and an old man who were sailing down a river in England are intercepted by a mugger, who turns their boat into a pirate-ship.
original_name: The Steam-Driven Adventures of Riverboat Bill
plot_en: Boy, his three pals and an old man who were sailing down a river in England are intercepted by a mugger, who turns their boat into a pirate-ship.
